page.title: 18Working round Holbeach Bank
page.content: A survey was conducted to find out about employment around Holbeach Bank. It was found that most people are involved in processing or growing food as this is a farming area. A lot of vegetables are prepacked to be sold in big shops. Out of 45 parents: 13 are food processors 6 are farmers 8 are housewives 2 are food merchants 2 are shops assistants 5 are builders 2 are lorry drivers 4 are teachers One father is retired and there is a vicar and a market stallholder. Not many people are unemployed because there are lots of jobs to be done on the land. Gangs of workers go out to do the work that cannot be done by machines.
